channel.title: Aether Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Aether Village" - Hidden in the Swordfish

item.title: Aether Village
item.content:encoded:
We're now at 17 villagers, could use more active ninja to give us a big push in the war. those who make the difference to get the NRF will be well rewarded. especially if you participate in bingo'ing

-we've got a little pull now. we're allied with 2 Immortal Realm villages, as well as 1 epic village, and a couple smaller ones.

-we have about a 20% tax rate, still relatively low. which helps if you want to grind ryo

-not many strong ninja, meaning easy kaiju drops

will you make the difference for us?
